Game.Name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Double Pack 2 (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Yu-Gi-Oh! Double Pack 2 is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Konami,which was released in 2006.Cheat: Unlock new Tournament Divisions in Dungeon Dice MonstersUnlock the following divisions by completing their respective tasks.Cheat: Unlock new Tournament Divisions in Dungeon Dice MonstersComplete the following tasks to unlock each new map or LM type in Destiny Board Traveler.Cheat: Unlock new Tournament Divisions in Dungeon Dice MonstersComplete the following tasks to unlock each new world in Destiny Board Traveler.Cheat: At the title screen, press these codes in to unlock the character.Cheat: Here how to unlock some board mapsCheat: Complete the following to unlock the following divisions.
Game.Notes: This double pack is a compilation of two Yu-Gi-Oh! games, previously released individually for the GBA: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Sacred Cards Yu-Gi-Oh!: Reshef of Destruction
